Summary: ORANGE/WHITE LIGHTS IN A SEMI STRAIGHT LINE IN 4 SETS, THEN A SECOND LIGHTS THE SAME ,FLASH AND HOLD THEN AGAIN TO THE LEFT 2ARE SHOWN
divs: Sighting DetailsMY MOTHER AND I WERE LEAVING DE LEON TEXAS ON HWY 6 AND JUST PASS THE LEON RIVER BRIDGE IN THE CLEARING I HAPPEN TO SEE A FLASH UP IN THE SKY. AS I LOOKED I SEEN 4 SETS OF LIGHTS IN A STRAIGHT LINE LIKE CASTLE TOP ORANGE AND WHITE IN COLOR AND VERY BRIGHT LIKE AN EXPLOSION. AND A MOMENT LATER THERE WAS ANOTHER ONE TO THE LEFT OF THE FIRST. THE ONE ON THE RIGHT DISAPPEARED AND THE LEFT APPEARED. AND FOR A BRIEF MOMENT THEY WERE TOGETHER.THEN THEY BOTH WERE GONE. THEY WERE LARGE IN SIZE AND DID NOT TO APPEAR TO BE VERY HIGH IN ELEVATION. FROM HIGHWAY 6 THEY WERE SOUTHEASTWARD FROM ME TOWARDS COYMAN,LAKE PROCTOR, OR NORTHWEST DUBLIN. STRANGES THING MY MOTHER 76 AND I HAVE EVER SEEN.
trends: There have been 40 other sightings in Dublin
There were 2 other sightings in Dublin on or around November 19th 2009
